byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and PATRICK HEALY

lead_paragraph: The Texas senator’s early entry into the Republican race is a deliberate effort to build a coalition of Tea Party conservatives and evangelical Christians.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Becomes First Major Candidate to Announce Presidential Bid for 2016
headline.print_headline: Ted Cruz Becomes First Major Candidate to Announce Presidential Bid for 2016

snippet: The Texas senator’s early entry into the Republican race is a deliberate effort to build a coalition of Tea Party conservatives and evangelical Christians.
